creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: Yesterday’s report acknowledged the parallel realities of fire and peonies. Today, on the day of His Memorial, I want both worlds to come together, and embrace George Floyd on His final journey.
title: June 4, 2020: REST IN POWER! (George Floyd)
